title: Looking for a ranked team!
body:
A couple of weeks ago I made an identical post to this and had some very eager people looking to join, but unfortunately I became ill and my absence caused the team to disband. So here I am again!

Looking for serious dedicated players who are willing to learn and take criticism but also want to have fun, you must have a mic and either discord, skype or teamspeak. **Age and rank do not matter.**

Discord channel: https://discord.gg/wJE3B

-- Ventrix

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Sure, I would love to join. If you feel sick again then I'm good with waiting til your back to health.
If voice communication is needed then Skype would be possible since I use it a lot. 
Oh and Im a toxic free player unless I am on a 12 loss streak I just get a little salty but never blame the team for my wrongs or any simple mistakes
Silver 5? were looking for a diamond+ jgler

I don't think you understand...
I'm looking to create a team of players, not to join one.

Also this post wasn't directed at you or in any way a reply to your post.
So what was the point of your comment?
